item.title: Battletech Display Terrace Part 2
item.description: I didn’t think I would be revisiting this project so soon, but the foam was already cut, and I filled up the first terrain piece with my entire collection of painted ‘Mechs. I also remembered to take more in-progress pictures, so there’s a bit more detail to the process.

item.title: Battletech Display Terrace
item.description: As my collection of 3d printed and purchased Battletech figures has grown, I needed a better way to display printed pieces. This homemade tiered shelf is what I came up with.
